title: How to remove champion outline in replays?
body: When I open my replays, I usually focus the camera on the champion I'm playing. Since focusing the camera on a champion creates an outline (blue or red depending on which team they are on) around them, I was wondering, is there a way to remove that outline without removing the focus?

replies.body: Sadly there's not a way for you to disable that outline when you have a champion selected. However, if you think this is something that really should be tweaked then go ahead and post this idea over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) to get more visibility!
